question: Write a letter to friend who organize a part last week and you forgot the wallet at their house.
text: I would like to thank you for a nice party last week; it was a pleasure to be part of it. I really enjoyed a lot, although we should arrange similar once a month to get together. It will be one of my great holiday week spend in life, Thanks a ton for organizing such party.

Smith, I have forgotten my wallet at your house that must be in the drawer next to the bed in second room. Could you please check if it's still there. I am really sorry I don’t know how it left over there, usually I don’t forget the wallet like that, It must be party effect.

Kindly send my wallet back as I have my money and all bank cards are in that, I would definitely need them. You can send through FedEx on my address, House no: X38, street X 3883 C, Highland Toronto, Canada.
